channel.title: Jonas on Software on jonasg.io
channel.description: Recent content in Jonas on Software on jonasg.io

item.title: How to Effectively Test Time-Dependent Code: Unit and Spring-Based Strategies
item.description: Explore strategies for reliable testing of time-dependent code, including techniques to mitigate flakiness in tests and enable precise time manipulation within your test suites.

item.title: Mastering the Object Mother
item.description: Discover how the Object Mother concept empowers developers to effortlessly generate intricate test objects, enhancing code readability, maintainability, and overall testing efficiency.
